Package View

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
View.GameView
public class GameView extends Object
Class name: GameView Methods list: addElementToIntroFrame, addElementToMainFrame, introGUI, menuBar, topGUI, leftGUI, mainGUI, rightGUI, bottomGUI, printTitle, dropDown, radioButton, timerControlButton, gameButton Constant list: mainBGColor, gameBGColor, gameButColor, gameButColorNull, menuColor Purpose: GameView class sets all the GUI for the NumPuz game using Swing
Since:
JavaSE-17
Version:
08 Nov 2022
Author:
Amy Fujimoto
See Also:
  • javax.swing

    Method name: aboutDialog Purpose: Display message to the user to provide "about" information to the user Algorithm: Show message with JOptionPane message dialog method
    void
    addElementsToMainFrame()
    Method name: addElementToMainFrame Purpose: Adds multiple panel and menu bar to the main frame of the NumPuz game Algorithm: Initializes the each panels by setting background and bounds and adds it to the main frame

    Method name: buttomGUI Purpose: Include the GUI component for the bottom panel Algorithm: Initializes JButtons necessary for the panel

    Method name: colorDialog Purpose: Set the dialog settings for color dialog Algorithm: Stop the timer and set size, visibility and resizability of the dialog
    void
    displayErrorDialog()
    Method name: displayErrorDialog Purpose: Display error message to the user when changing dimension in text mode Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message
    void
    displayLostDialog()
    Method name: dialogLostDialog Purpose: Display a dialog that indicates that the user lost the game and provide user options to continue, new game, or exit Algorithm: Stops the timer and displays dialog with object options and restarts setting, starts new game, or exits system when user selects try again, new game, or exit game respectively.
    void
    displayShuffleErrorDialog()
    Method name: displayShuffleErrorDialog Purpose: Display error message to the user when trying to start the game without shuffling Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message
    void
    displayWinDialog()
    Method name: dialogWinDialog Purpose: Display a dialog that indicates that the user won the game and provide user options to play again or exit Algorithm: Stops the timer and displays dialog with object options and new game or exits system when user selects play again or exit game, respectively.

    Method name: dropDown Purpose: Contains initialization of components that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the components in the correct location and adds it to the panel

    Method name: exitDialog Purpose: Display confirmation message to the user when trying to exit the game Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message and when user selects yes, it will exit the game

    boolean
    loadFromCSV()
    Method name: loadFromCSV Purpose: Load from the csv file and save it to the database Algorithm: Reads from csv file line by line and stores them as a puzzle button text where the last row is saved as a text for answer of the puzzle
    void
    loadGameFromData()
    Method name: loadFrloadGameFromDataomCSV Purpose: Load from the gameBasic object and save it to the database Algorithm: Reads from game basic object and stores them as a puzzle button text where the last row is saved as a text for answer of the puzzle

    Method name: moveButton Purpose: Updates the main game button as selected by the user and moves it to the empty tile
    void
    newGame()
    Method name: newGame Purpose: Start a new game by shuffling the game and resetting the time and counts Algorithm: Call methods to reset setting to default, remove button to avoid overlays, shuffle the tiles, update the button, and update the new empty tile location.
    void
    play()
    Method name: play Algorithm: Sets settings for splash screen, main game frame, GUI components within the frame, and color dialog.

    removeGameButton()
    Method name: removeGameButton Purpose: Removes the game buttons from the panel Algorithm: Loops over each of the puzzle button displayed on the panel and removes them.
    void
    restartSettings()
    Method name: restartSetings Purpose: Updates the count and time to restart the game from scratch Algorithm: Stops the timer and resets the count to 0 and time to the appropriate time as per dimension size and difficulty

    showAnswerWindow()
    Method name: showAnswerWindow Purpose: Show the answer to the current puzzle the user is solving Algorithm: Open a new dialog which shows the correct location of the tiles and while looking at the answer, the time still ticks.
    void
    shufflePuzzle()
    Method name: shufflePuzzle Purpose: Shuffle the buttons in a random order Algorithm: Loops over the 2D array of the puzzle buttons and randomize the button by utilizing the Random class.
    void
    splashScreenGUI(JWindow window)
    Method name: splashScreenGUI Purpose: Display a splash screen to user prior to starting the game Algorithm: Display icon on a window without any buttons and show it for only a certain amount of time

    void

    void
    textInputDialog()
    Method name: textInputDialog Purpose: Display a prompt for use to enter a text for game buttons Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showInputDialog method and saves the text in the model if the text is appropriate length, otherwise it will prompt an error dialog
    void
    timerSettings()
    Method name: timerSettings Purpose: Sets the timer setting to appropriate values when timer hits 0 Algorithm: When timer hits 0, timer stops and sets the value to 180, and show a dialog indicating that the user lost the game
    void
    timerStartButton()
    Method name: timerStartButton Purpose: Contains initialization of start timer button that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the button in the correct location and adds it to the panel

    topGUI()
    Method name: topGUI Purpose: Contains buttons for the top panel Algorithm: Initializes JButtons necessary for the panel
    void
    updateCountLabel()
    Method name: updateCountLabel Purpose: Update the counter of the label Algorithm: Retrieve current count and set it to count label
    void
    updateEmptyTile()
    Method name: updateEmptyTile Purpose: Update the location of the empty tile Algorithm: Loops over the puzzle buttons and retrieve the index of the empty tile
    void
    updateGameButton()
    Method name: updateGameButton Purpose: Updates the main game button for when color, dimension, type changes Algorithm: Reads the puzzleButton array to adjust the color, dim, type if any of them changed
    void
    updatePointLabel()
    Method name: updatePointLabel Purpose: Update the point of the label Algorithm: Retrieve current point and set it to point label
    void
    updateTimeCount()

      public void displayLostDialog()
      Method name: dialogLostDialog Purpose: Display a dialog that indicates that the user lost the game and provide user options to continue, new game, or exit Algorithm: Stops the timer and displays dialog with object options and restarts setting, starts new game, or exits system when user selects try again, new game, or exit game respectively.

      public void displayWinDialog()

    • displayShuffleErrorDialog

      public void displayShuffleErrorDialog()
      Method name: displayShuffleErrorDialog Purpose: Display error message to the user when trying to start the game without shuffling Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message

    • aboutDialog

      public void aboutDialog()
      Method name: aboutDialog Purpose: Display message to the user to provide "about" information to the user Algorithm: Show message with JOptionPane message dialog method

    • initColorDialog

      public void initColorDialog()
      Method name: initColorDialog Purpose: Initializes the dialog for color setting dialog Algorithm: Initializes the dialog, label, color buttons, and adds components to dialog in appropriate location

    • colorDialog

      public void colorDialog()
      Method name: colorDialog Purpose: Set the dialog settings for color dialog Algorithm: Stop the timer and set size, visibility and resizability of the dialog

    • exitDialog

      public void exitDialog()
      Method name: exitDialog Purpose: Display confirmation message to the user when trying to exit the game Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message and when user selects yes, it will exit the game

    • textInputDialog

      public void textInputDialog()
      Method name: textInputDialog Purpose: Display a prompt for use to enter a text for game buttons Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showInputDialog method and saves the text in the model if the text is appropriate length, otherwise it will prompt an error dialog

    • inputErrorDialog

      public void inputErrorDialog()
      Method name: inputErrorDialog Purpose: Display error message to the user when user entered a text too short Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message

    • successfulSaveDialog

      public void successfulSaveDialog()
      Method name: successfulSaveDialog Purpose: Display message to the user when they successfully saved the game button to a file Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showMessageDialog

    • successfulLoadDialog

      public void successfulLoadDialog()
      Method name: successfulLoadDialog Purpose: Display message to the user when they successfully loaded the game button from a file Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showMessageDialog

    • saveErrorDialog

      public void saveErrorDialog()
      Method name: saveErrorDialog Purpose: Display message to the user when they failed saved the game button to a file Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showMessageDialog and Warning message method

    • loadErrorDialog

      public void loadErrorDialog()
      Method name: loadErrorDialog Purpose: Display message to the user when they failed to load the game button from a file Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showMessageDialog and Warning message method

    • splashScreenGUI

      public void splashScreenGUI(JWindow window)
      Method name: splashScreenGUI Purpose: Display a splash screen to user prior to starting the game Algorithm: Display icon on a window without any buttons and show it for only a certain amount of time
      Parameters:
      window - JWindow to display the label and title on

    • addElementsToMainFrame

      public void addElementsToMainFrame()
      Method name: addElementToMainFrame Purpose: Adds multiple panel and menu bar to the main frame of the NumPuz game Algorithm: Initializes the each panels by setting background and bounds and adds it to the main frame

    • menuBar

      public void menuBar()
      Method name: menuBar Purpose: To set the menu bar that will be located at the top of the game frame Algorithm: Initializes JMenuBar to create menu bar and adds components

    • topGUI

      public void topGUI()
      Method name: topGUI Purpose: Contains buttons for the top panel Algorithm: Initializes JButtons necessary for the panel

    • leftGUI

      public void leftGUI()
      Method name: leftGUI Purpose: Contains dropdown selection and buttons for the left panel Algorithm: Calls the methods that sets up the components

    • mainGUI

      public void mainGUI()
      Method name: mainGUI Purpose: Contains the method to display the main game feature Algorithm: Calls the gameButton method

    • rightGUI

      public void rightGUI()
      Method name: rightGUI Purpose: Contains initialization of the labels that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initializes JLabel for each label and sets their positions

    • bottomGUI

      public void bottomGUI()
      Method name: buttomGUI Purpose: Include the GUI component for the bottom panel Algorithm: Initializes JButtons necessary for the panel

    • printTitle

      public void printTitle()
      Method name: printTitle Purpose: Contains initialization of the labels that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initializes the panel and reads in the file to be used as the title located on the top panel

    • dropDown

      public void dropDown()
      Method name: dropDown Purpose: Contains initialization of components that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the components in the correct location and adds it to the panel

    • colorButton

      public void colorButton()
      Method name: colorButton Purpose: Contains initialization of color button that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the button in the correct location and adds it to the panel

    • timerStartButton

      public void timerStartButton()
      Method name: timerStartButton Purpose: Contains initialization of start timer button that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the button in the correct location and adds it to the panel

    • timerStopButton

      public void timerStopButton()
      Method name: timerStopButton Purpose: Contains initialization of stop timer button that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the button in the correct location and adds it to the panel

    • gameButton

      public void gameButton(Color mainColor)
      Method name: gameButton Purpose: Adds the main game button to the panel in the correct size and format
      Parameters:
      mainColor - Color object for current color update Algorithm: Reads the puzzleButton array to add the button to the panel

    • updateGameButton

      public void updateGameButton()
      Method name: updateGameButton Purpose: Updates the main game button for when color, dimension, type changes Algorithm: Reads the puzzleButton array to adjust the color, dim, type if any of them changed

    • showAnswer

      public void showAnswer(JPanel panel)
      Method name: showAnswer Purpose: Adds the game button answers to the panel with the same format as the main game
      Parameters:
      panel - Object of JPanel to show the answer of the game on Algorithm: Reads the puzzleButton array to add the button to the panel

    • moveButton

      public void moveButton(JButton button)
      Method name: moveButton Purpose: Updates the main game button as selected by the user and moves it to the empty tile
      Parameters:
      button - JButton array that contains the button object of the main game Algorithm: Collect the location of the tile clicked and swap the location of the button with the empty slot. The button is to be only moved if they are directly beside the empty slot.

    • removeGameButton

      public void removeGameButton()
      Method name: removeGameButton Purpose: Removes the game buttons from the panel Algorithm: Loops over each of the puzzle button displayed on the panel and removes them.

    • newGame

      public void newGame()
      Method name: newGame Purpose: Start a new game by shuffling the game and resetting the time and counts Algorithm: Call methods to reset setting to default, remove button to avoid overlays, shuffle the tiles, update the button, and update the new empty tile location.

    • restartSettings

      public void restartSettings()
      Method name: restartSetings Purpose: Updates the count and time to restart the game from scratch Algorithm: Stops the timer and resets the count to 0 and time to the appropriate time as per dimension size and difficulty

    • puzzleCompleted

      public boolean puzzleCompleted()
      Method name: puzzleCompleted Purpose: Check if the current state of the puzzle is in the completed state
      Returns:
      true if puzzle matches the answer, false if puzzle does not match the answer Algorithm: Loops over the current puzzle button and compares it with the answer.

    • shufflePuzzle

      public void shufflePuzzle()
      Method name: shufflePuzzle Purpose: Shuffle the buttons in a random order Algorithm: Loops over the 2D array of the puzzle buttons and randomize the button by utilizing the Random class.

    • loadFromCSV

      public boolean loadFromCSV()
      Method name: loadFromCSV Purpose: Load from the csv file and save it to the database Algorithm: Reads from csv file line by line and stores them as a puzzle button text where the last row is saved as a text for answer of the puzzle
      Returns:
      true if loading from csv file was successful, otherwise return false

    • loadGameFromData

      public void loadGameFromData()
      Method name: loadFrloadGameFromDataomCSV Purpose: Load from the gameBasic object and save it to the database Algorithm: Reads from game basic object and stores them as a puzzle button text where the last row is saved as a text for answer of the puzzle

    • updateEmptyTile

      public void updateEmptyTile()
      Method name: updateEmptyTile Purpose: Update the location of the empty tile Algorithm: Loops over the puzzle buttons and retrieve the index of the empty tile

    • updateCountLabel

      public void updateCountLabel()
      Method name: updateCountLabel Purpose: Update the counter of the label Algorithm: Retrieve current count and set it to count label

    • updatePointLabel

      public void updatePointLabel()
      Method name: updatePointLabel Purpose: Update the point of the label Algorithm: Retrieve current point and set it to point label

    • updateTimeCount

      public void updateTimeCount()
      Method name: updateTimeLabel Purpose: Update the time of the label Algorithm: Retrieve current time and set it to time label
